Constructor Detail

FlyGame

public FlyGame()
Creates JPanel for FlyGame's title screen. Plays opening music.

Method Detail

createBug

public void createBug(int bug)
Creates a bug at a random location on the wall.

modifies: The bug is added to aLabel and layeredPane.

requires: Bugs will only be created with valid int values. Use the provided static final int to make bugs. Game must be playing for the bugs to be created.

Parameters:
bug - Bug you want to create

createGnats

public void createGnats(AnimatedLabel label)
Creates a Gnat below the label

modifies: The Gnats are created inside an AnimatedLabel which is added to ArrayList aLabel and JLayeredPanel layeredPane. Cursor location is sent to the AnimatedLabel which passes it to the AnimatedThing, so that it can hurt the player.

requires: Game must be playing for the bugs to be created. label must not be null.

Parameters:
label - AnimatedLabel that is creating the wasps

createBlueShots

public void createBlueShots(AnimatedLabel label)
Creates BlueShots that can hurt the player. Plays BlueShot sound.

modifies: The shots are created inside an AnimatedLabel which is added to ArrayList aLabel and JLayeredPanel layeredPane. Cursor location is sent to the AnimatedLabel which passes it to the AnimatedThing, so that it can hurt the player.

requires: Game must be playing for the bugs to be created. label must not be null.

Parameters:
label - AnimatedLabel where BlueShot is created

remove

public void remove(AnimatedLabel label)
Removes an AnimatedLabel from the game.

modifies: label is removed from layeredPane and aLabel

requires: label != null

Parameters:
label - AnimatedLabel you want to remove from play

clearScreen

public void clearScreen()
Removes all AnimatedLabels from the game.

modifies: aLabel is emptied and all of its contents are removed from layeredPane

requires: nothing

takeDamage

public void takeDamage()
Causes the user to take damage. Will set gameOver if user dies. Animates the process and disallows swatting for a few seconds.

modifies: Subtracts from user.getHealth(). Can set gameOver state. Temporarily changes ableToAttack and the damageAnimating state. gameCursorLabel is changed to show animation.

requires: User cannot be in damageAnimating state, meaning you are temporarily invulnerable after taking a hit. Game must be currently playing for this to work.

gameOver

public void gameOver()
Restarts the current level

modifies: Calls stopMusic() and clearScreen(). Resets user health to 3, then restarts level.

requires: gameOver state must be set and cannot be on title screen

playMusic

public void playMusic()
Plays the music for your current level.

modifies: currentMusic is set to currently playing music. musicPlaying state is set to true

requires: nothing

stopMusic

public void stopMusic()
Stops the currently playing music.

modifies: musicPlaying state is set to false currentMusic is stopped

requires: nothing

playLevel

public void playLevel(int level)
Loads input level.

modifies: Sets onTitleScreen state to false. Initializes toBeKilled, timer, onScreen. Sets currentLevel, user's max level, then saves the game. Current level screen is setup. Level music starts playing and 100 bugs are created at a rate decided by the level. They are told to animate. If the user reaches gameOver state, gameOver() is called. If toBeKilled reaches 0, the level ends, its music starts, the screen is cleared of garbage, and the next level is loaded.

requires: level must be at least 1

Parameters:
level - level which you want to play

mouseMoved

public void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Makes CursorLabels follow the cursor. Animates the cursor when over a button in the title menu.

modifies: gameCursorLabel and menuCursorLabel move with the mouse. menuCursorLabelAnimating is temporarily altered while it animates. Sends cursor location to AnimatedLabels so they can attack the user.

Specified by:
mouseMoved in interface java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

mouseDragged

public void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Makes CursorLabels follow the cursor. Animates the cursor when over a button in the title menu.

modifies: gameCursorLabel and menuCursorLabel move with the mouse. Sends cursor location to AnimatedLabels so they can attack the user.

requires: nothing

Specified by:
mouseDragged in interface java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

mousePressed

public void mousePressed(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Takes all clicking input from users, including using buttons and swatting flies.

modifies: On title screen, can stopMusic, then call playLevel(int). On game screen, causes gameCursorLabel to animate and check for hits. gameCursorLabelAnimating is temporarily changed while animation takes place. Sounds are played depending on if a hit is made. toBeKilled, onScreen, counterIcons, and the timer are changed to represent a kill. kill() command sent to AnimatedLabel to force it's death animation.

requires: nothing

Specified by:
mousePressed in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener

mouseReleased

public void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Not implemented.

Specified by:
mouseReleased in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener

public void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
Not implemented.

Specified by:
mouseClicked in interface java.awt.event.MouseListener
